Warehouse Chief Donal:
More than anyone else, we Dwarves know the importance of wealth -- but comraderie and trust are even more valuable.
What price can you put on a clan member to whom you would entrust your life? If you have someone like that nearby, they are more precious than all the jewels in the world!
